longbridge.services

Interface AccountService


  • public interface AccountService
    The AccountService interface provides the provides the methods for retrieving a customer's account information

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account getAccount(java.lang.Long accId)
      Returns a particular account for a customer
      java.lang.Iterable<Account> getAccounts(Customer customer)
      Returns a list of accounts owned by a particular customer
      FinancialTransaction getAccountStatements(Account account, java.util.Date fromDate, java.util.Date toDate)
      Returns the details of financial transactions carried out a particular account within a specified period
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> getBalance(Account account)
      Returns the details of an account balance.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        Account getAccount(java.lang.Long accId)
        Returns a particular account for a customer
        Parameters:
        accId - the account id
        Returns:
        an Account object

      • getAccounts

        java.lang.Iterable<Account> getAccounts(Customer customer)
        Returns a list of accounts owned by a particular customer
        Parameters:
        customer - the particular customer
        Returns:
        a list of Account

      • getBalance

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigDecimal> getBalance(Account account)
        Returns the details of an account balance. The details are contained in a map to represent the various account balances. A customer's account can have 'Ledger balance', 'Available balance' and other types of balances. These types of balances are stored as keys of the map, while the amounts are stored as the values of the map
        Parameters:
        account - the specified account
        Returns:
        a map representing the types of account balances

      • getAccountStatements

        FinancialTransaction getAccountStatements(Account account,
                                          java.util.Date fromDate,
                                          java.util.Date toDate)
        Returns the details of financial transactions carried out a particular account within a specified period
        Parameters:
        account - the particular account
        fromDate - the starting date
        toDate - the ending date
        Returns:
        a FinancialTransaction containing details of the transactions
